## LL12

```{r LL12-data-load}

ll12_data <- read_csv(path(here(), './data/ieeg_behave/LL12_raw_behave.csv'), col_types = cols(X1 = col_double(),
                                                                                              Subject = col_character(),
                                                                                              Trial = col_character(),
                                                                                              Lives = col_double(),
                                                                                              Trial_on_off = col_double(),
                                                                                              TrialType = col_double(),
                                                                                              Time = col_double(),
                                                                                              GhostLocation = col_double(),
                                                                                              UserLocation = col_double(),
                                                                                              Direction = col_double(),
                                                                                              Biscuit1 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit2 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit3 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit4 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Biscuit5 = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Attack = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Chase = col_logical(),
                                                                                              Eaten = col_double(),
                                                                                              Score = col_double()))


```

```{r LL12-data-prep}

# clean Biscuits #
ll12_data_clean <- clean_bci_data(ll12_data, 512)

# create distance df #
ll12_data_distance <- create_distance_df_bci(ll12_data_clean)

# task vars df #
ll12_all_vars_df <- get_across_task_variables_bci(ll12_data_clean)

```


```{r}

ll12_all_vars_df %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = block, y = block_deaths)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  ggtitle("Deaths across blocks")


ll12_all_vars_df %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = block, y = average_dots_per_block)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"))+
  ggtitle("Dots across blocks")


```


```{r trials-no-biscuits}

tmp <- ll12_data_clean %>%
  filter(trial_length != 999) %>%
  select(trial_numeric, trial_length) %>%
  mutate(trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric %in% bad_trials) %>%
  distinct()


ll12_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  group_by(trial_numeric) %>%
  mutate(total_eaten = max(Eaten)) %>%
  filter(total_eaten == 0) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(GhostLocation, UserLocation), values_to = "location", names_to = "unit") %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_flip, y = location, color = unit)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 170, color = "black") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 10, color = "black") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  facet_wrap(~trial_numeric)

no_biscuits_trials <- ll12_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  group_by(trial_numeric) %>%
  mutate(total_eaten = max(Eaten)) %>%
  select(trial_numeric, total_eaten) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  filter(total_eaten == 0) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  # exclude fake trial 0 
  filter(neural_trial_numeric >= 0) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  pull(neural_trial_numeric)

# possible paused trials
tmp <- ll12_data_clean %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  filter(neural_trial_numeric == 246)

# 247 is not paused, but ran into wall and waited

```


```{r how-long-do-trials-last}


ll12_all_vars_df %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_length)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  geom_vline(xintercept =10) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"))


long_trials <- ll12_all_vars_df %>%
  select(trial_numeric, trial_length) %>%
  unique() %>%
  filter(trial_length > 10) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  pull(neural_trial_numeric)

```


```{r compile-bad-trials}


bad_trials <- unique(c(no_biscuits_trials, long_trials))


```


## all other trials look good!

```{r all-other-trials}

# no ghost trials
ll12_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  filter(trial_numeric != 0) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  filter(!(neural_trial_numeric %in% bad_trials)) %>%
  filter(TrialType > 16) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(GhostLocation, UserLocation), values_to = "location", names_to = "unit") %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_flip, y = location, color = unit)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 170, color = "black") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 10, color = "black") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  ylim(0, 200) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  facet_wrap(~trial_numeric)


# first 100 trials
ll12_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  filter(trial_numeric != 0) %>%
  filter(TrialType <=16) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  filter(!(neural_trial_numeric %in% bad_trials)) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric < 100) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(GhostLocation, UserLocation), values_to = "location", names_to = "unit") %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_flip, y = location, color = unit)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 170, color = "black") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 10, color = "black") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  ylim(0, 200) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  facet_wrap(~trial_numeric)

# 100-200 trials
ll12_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  filter(trial_length <= 10) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric != 0) %>%
  filter(TrialType <=16) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  filter(!(neural_trial_numeric %in% bad_trials)) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric >= 100 & trial_numeric < 200) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(GhostLocation, UserLocation), values_to = "location", names_to = "unit") %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_flip, y = location, color = unit)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 170, color = "black") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 10, color = "black") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  facet_wrap(~trial_numeric)


# 200-300 trials
ll12_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  filter(trial_length <= 10) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric != 0) %>%
  filter(TrialType <=16) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  filter(!(neural_trial_numeric %in% bad_trials)) %>%
  filter(trial_numeric >= 200 & trial_numeric < 300) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(GhostLocation, UserLocation), values_to = "location", names_to = "unit") %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_flip, y = location, color = unit)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 170, color = "black") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 10, color = "black") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  facet_wrap(~trial_numeric)





```

```{r longest-trial}

# read in bad df
bad_df <- read_csv(path(here(), './data/ieeg_behave/LL12_bad_trials.csv'))


trial_times <- ll12_data_clean %>%
  filter(Trial != "ITI") %>%
  filter(trial_numeric != 0) %>%
  mutate(neural_trial_numeric = trial_numeric - 1) %>%
  filter(!(neural_trial_numeric %in% bad_df$neural_trial_numeric)) %>%
  select(trial_length, trial_numeric) %>%
  distinct()

max(trial_times$trial_length)
```
